name: Monster Truck Beach Party
description:
4 Player Split-Screen Monster Truck Sandbox with big jumps.
Enter the closest Monster Truck and drive it around until the timer runs out.

Work in progress, more to come!

On foot controls:
- Enter vehicle - Face button top, "E"
- Jump - Face button bottom, "Space"
- Movement/Camera - Twin-stick on controller, "WASD"+mouse
- Pause - Start Button, "Escape" (toggle pause by the same player)

Vehicle controls:
- Exit vehicle - Face button top, "E"
- Handbrake - Face button left, "Space"
- Gas - Right trigger, "W"
- Reverse - Left trigger, "S"
- Reset/Flip vehicle - Face button left, "Z"
- Boost - Face button down, "Shift"
- Pause - Start Button, "Escape"(toggle pause by the same player)

Some known issues:
- Controller does not work in menus
- Sometimes the Vehicle can get stuck on objects (without reset working)
- Sometimes Character can't exit vehicle (exit is blocked), use reset and exit as the vehicle fall

Thanks for taking the time and checking out this small project!
Feel free to come with suggestions!
I hope you had fun playing!
